propose.from sentence: In this paper , we incorporate positioninvariance into RNN and propose a novel model named Disconnected Recurrent Neural Network ( DRNN ) .

position - invariance.from sentence: To maintain the position - invariance , we utilize max pooling to extract the important information , which has been suggested by .

special 1D CNN.from sentence: Our proposed model can also be regarded as a special 1D CNN where convolution kernels are replaced with recurrent units .
